channel.title: Seminars & Conferences on Chao ZHOU
channel.description: Recent content in Seminars & Conferences on Chao ZHOU

item.title: Membership of conference committees
item.description: Member of organizing committee for Quantitative Finance, 18 – 22 Mar, 2019 & 22 Jul – 31 Aug, 2019, held at Institute for Mathematical Sciences, National University of Singapore, Singapore. Member of organizing committee for The 7th Asian Quantitative Finance Conference (AQFC), 02 – 05 July, 2019, held at Vietnam Institute for Advanced Study in Mathematics, Hanoi, Vietnam. Member of organizing committee for Workshop Recent Developments in Mean-Field Game, Machine Learning and Quantitative Finance, Vietnam, Tuan Chau, May 2019

item.title: Organised Seminars & Conferences
item.description: Seminar on Quantitative Finance, by the Centre for Quantitative Finance NUS, from April 2014 site. Paris-Southeast Asia Conference in Mathematical Finance, jointly organized by the Centre for Quantitative Finance NUS, Institute of Technology of Cambodia, University of Evry and ENSIIE, and University Paris Diderot, Siem Reap, Cambodia, 7-11 February 2015 site. Second Paris-Asia Conference in Quantitative Finance, jointly organized by the Centre for Quantitative Finance, Institute of Real Estate Studies and Risk Management Institute NUS, University of Evry and ENSIIE, and University Paris Dauphine, Suzhou, China, 23-27 May 2017 site.
